titleInfo.title: 'An historical and descriptive account of Persia, from the earliest ages to the present time; with a detailed view of its resources, government, population, natural history, and the character of its inhabitants, particularly of the wandering tribes; including a description of Afghanistan and Beloochistan.'

physicalDescription.extent: This volume contains a list of contents giving chapter headings and page references. Each chapter heading is followed by a detailed breakdown of the contents of that chapter. There is also a list of engravings.

mods.abstract: An historical and descriptive account of Persia, from the earliest ages to the present time; with a detailed view of its resources, government, population, natural history, and the character of its inhabitants, particularly of the wandering tribes; including a description of Afghanistan and Beloochistan.Author: James Baillie Fraser.Publication details: Edinburgh: Oliver & Boyd, Tweeddale Court; and Simpkin & Marshall, London.Edition: second edition.Physical Description: 14 engravings, including 1 map.
